CustomField.description: This field tracks the creation and conversion of a Lead, Account and Opportunity into an Account and Opportunity when a customer engages in a project. It is used to mark cases where there was no prior Lead in the system, initiating a direct lead conversion process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically checked when a customer engages in a project and there is no existing Lead, Account and Opportunity, triggering the creation of a new Lead and its conversion into an Account and Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Direct Lead
